page.title: 02SUNDAYS
page.content: SUNDAYS I AM AWAKE AT 6.30 AM AND HAVE A LIE IN TILL 7.00 AM THEN I GO DOWNSTAIRS TO WATCH WHAT I RECORDED THE NIGHT BEFORE. SOMETIMES THE VIDEO GOES UP THE CREEK AND I HAVE TO GET MY MUM TO FIDDLE ABOUT WITH THE KNOB AT THE BACK OF THE TELEVISION. WE GET PICKED UP FOR CRICKET AT 9.30 AM BY JOHN WHITLSEA WE HAVE TO PICK UP ANOTHER THREE PEOPLE , WE ARRIVE AT THE GROUND AT ABOUT 9.50 AM MY BROTHER AND ROGER ARE THE CAPTAINS. THEY PICK A SIDE.I AM NORMALLY ON MY BROTHERS SIDE. THE CRICKET CLUB IS IN HAMPTON, IT IS CALLED ACCACIA AND OUR EMBLEM IS A TREE THERE ARE ABOUT 20 PEOPLE , THAT GO TO CRICKET. WE NORMALLY TOSS A COIN TO SEE WHO BATS FIRST AND WHO FIELDS. SINCE I HAVE BEEN AT CRICKET I HAVE DROPED 5 CATCHES AND THEY HAVE ALL BEEN EASY. WHEN ITS MY TURN TO BAT I GET ABOUT TEN RUN. AFTER THE GAME
